extendedInfo.description: With one app, check-in to Facebook, Foursquare, Google+ and Google Places with Checkin King.  Here is what the press is saying about Checkin King:  âCheckin King makes checking in to any or all of those services as easy as one click.â â PhandroidâHow to check in to multiple location services with one clickâ â CNETâ43 Best New Android Appsâ â AndroidPolice.comBenefits include:+ Include a message with every check-in+ Ability to search for location across all your social networks+ Map views to see where you are checking in+ Free with access to all the features, and no ads!+ Checkin Widget w/Google Voice IntegrationInstructions to see your Google+ check-ins:+ Scroll down until and click the button "manage apps & activities"+ Now you should see Checkin King+ Click on Checkin King+ Now you should see the check-in as well as be able to share it. You can also choose who you want to automatically share with.Questions, suggestions, problems?  Contact us at checkinking@gmail.com

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Wish it would find the fb places more
reviews.author: kalia bratton

reviews.title: The Best Checkin App!
reviews.comment: Still the best app to checkin to multiple social neworks!   No other free or paid app matches up for simple checkins
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Battery usage is ridiculous
reviews.comment: Nice app but you better think twice before installing it.   The battery drain just from having this app on your phone is ridiculous.
reviews.author: Clay Kirby

reviews.title: Battery drain
reviews.comment: I see a lot of reviews of battery drain, so I took that into consideration when downloading this app. The app works well functionally, but the battery does get wasted since when running in the background it\'s always checking your location. The best way around this is to kill the app when you\'re done checking in. Fix this problem and the rating will be better.  Other issues... I\'ve seen many times the same location appearing as different for Facebook, Google, and foursquare.
reviews.author: Steve Igrejas

reviews.title: Great, but no matching.
reviews.comment: Come on guys!   Having Battery stats built into android is ratting you out.  This app is causing partial wake usage and constant GPS activation.  Let us turn off the background processes in settings.  \"Only acquire location when app is opened\" or change the location refresh interval from 15 minutes to Never (manual).  Works great but I\'m forced to uninstall it.
reviews.author: Paul Kopalek

reviews.title: Requires master password for Google
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t use the access tokens for apps. Instead, it requires the master Google password. To use it w/o putting my password, I turned 2-step verification and generated an application-specific password. The app told me \'don\'t use application-specific passwords. Use the main Google password instead\" (or similar wording). Why? I won\'t use Google Places integration unless it requires less permissions.  Foursquare works OK. Didn\'t test Facebook.
reviews.author: Ramiro Rela

reviews.title: Wake locks = battery hog
reviews.comment: If you have a specialized battery stat app installed, you can see that this app is ALWAYS running in the background. A recent check shows 45+ minutes of wake locks from this app, meaning that the phone never goes into deep sleep. So this app sucks battery like you wouldn\'t believe. Devs, please clean up your code.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Post to twitter
reviews.comment: How can I have my check in on 4sq posted to twitter?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App sucks
reviews.comment: I could not even log in, the app kept shutting my phone off.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Strange GPS hog
reviews.comment: Good, but eats battery. Why does my GPS consistently get turned on even though I\'m not using it. This app is the culprit!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I use this app every day!
reviews.comment: I use this app every single day. There were issues in the beginning with it syncing places from all services. However, I updated my business info to look exactly the same in all services and now it works perfectly! Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC rezound
reviews.comment: I just downloaded this today and I\'m already disappointed. I try to check into my business and the only think it allows me to check into is four square. I know for a fact I\'m on Facebook so I don\'t know what it won\'t let me check into that too. Completely destroys the purpose if j still need to check into everything
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but...
reviews.comment: Seems to work well, but it keeps starting a background service without being used, and that is accessing the gps. It\'s the 3rd highest battery use on my phone, without being used!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: Lame lame lame
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: check in unsuccessful
reviews.comment: have tried several times it is never once checked in.  it finds my place accurately 100% of the time.  however 100% of the time I receive check in unsuccessful.  therefore, have to uninstall. What\'s the point?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Check-in king
reviews.comment: Lovely
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sparky Records
reviews.comment: Very nice app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Where is the google checkin?
reviews.comment: Have to checkin multiple times due to 1 place having multiple spellings and every checkin uses only a certain spelling is gay! Google checkin doesn\'t show up on G+
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I Likes
reviews.comment: I cant add new places but for the most part its GREAT.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Seems great
